be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.globalization

Class LanguageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.globalization.LanguageManager

  • public final class LanguageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that has the responsibility to provide correct application text based on the set locale.
    Author:
    Thibault Helsmoortel
